title: Men's Eco-Smart Full-Zip Bamboo Viscose Hoodie
description:
Introducing our latest must-have Men's Zip Hoodie, a piece crafted using our premium Bamboo French Terry fabric - a sustainable material that is naturally breathable, ultra soft, highly moisture-wicking and durable. Our versatile zip hoodie was inspired by the men who appreciate the classics and seek beyond the best.

Enjoy of ultimate nonstop comfort, superior performance and a classic relaxed, not baggy, fit that allows you to move freely and unrestricted. Four-way super stretch knit, hand warmer split kangaroo pocket, double layer built-in hood, stretch ribbed cuffs and waistband, great every day full zip, mid-weight warmth, true to size cut. Its innovative construction and advanced material set our hoodie above the rest. Level up your wardrobe and experience possibly the best hoodie you ever put on.  

FABRIC: 

70% Viscose from Organic Bamboo
25% Organic Cotton
5% Spandex for added stretch

PRODUCT DETAILS + FEATURES:

  • Sustainable
  • Ultra soft and comfy Bamboo French Terry fabric
  • Relaxed-classic fit through body, not baggy
  • Front full length zipper-closure
  • Double layer built-in hood
  • Metal and sturdy zipper
  • Adjustable drawstring at hood
  • Metal eyelets on the drawn-string holes
  • Front split kangaroo patch pocket at front
  • 1x1 Stretch rib at cuffs and waistband
  • Long sleeves
  • Neckline twill tape for extra comfort
FIT & SIZING:
True to size
Relaxed easy fit
Hits at the hip
Chest Size: 
Small - 38 - 42"
Medium - 41 - 45"

Large - 43 - 47"
X-Large - 45 - 49"
XX-Large - 48 - 52"

Length (HPS to bottom hem):

Small - 25"
Medium - 26"
Large - 27"
X-Large - 28"
XX-Large - 29"
